about_the_game:
ifgame studio's experimental metaverse framework "Hollow" is now available on the Steam platform, and now includes a variety of game content, video, online streaming media, online social networking, and other functions, and has been independently designed and innovated for virtual reality interaction. The framework is still in Early Access, and the production team is developing user-defined maps, map editing props, mobile phone entry ports, and more.

In Hollow, players can fly freely, traverse multiple unique maps, search for chests in the setting to collect coins, return to the lobby to buy their favorite characters, and we also have shooting mini-games, movie theaters, and settings for socializing.
At present, the game already has a simple in-game map building function, and the player-defined map is currently being developed.
We also look forward to your in-game insights and suggestions, and we look forward to your feedback.
Official email: 120722377@qq.com
